What are some potential applications of the Verus protocol, and how can I get involved with the project?

The Verus protocol has a wide range of potential applications, including using public blockchains as a service, creating blockchain-based polls and voting systems, and many other public infrastructure applications. These applications have the potential to revolutionize the way we interact with blockchain technology and can have a significant impact on various industries.

If you're interested in getting involved with the Verus project, there are many ways to do so. The Verus Coin Foundation is looking for talented individuals with a variety of skills, including development, design, blockchain architecture, business development, community development, and IT expertise. Whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting out, there are opportunities to contribute to the project and help shape its future.

To get started, you can reach out to a Verus project representative through the contact information provided. This includes email, Twitter, Reddit, and Discord channels, where you can connect with other community members and project representatives. Some of the representatives you can reach out to on Discord include miketout, englal, michaeltoutjr, VirtualSoundNW, Asher, and crypto05.

By joining the Verus community, you can be a part of a decentralized project that's pushing the boundaries of what's possible with blockchain technology. Whether you're interested in contributing code, providing feedback, or simply learning more about the project, there are many ways to get involved and make a difference.

use pubic blockchains as a service, blockchain based polls and voting, and many more public infrastructure applications in the not too distant future.
